Documentation.long_help: Extract a i-j-k slice from a reservoir grid described as an unstructured grid or a 3D image data.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input from which the selection is extracted.

IntVectorProperty.name: PassDataToScript
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If ON, the script will have access to the cell data arrays (CellArray) and the 8 points data arrays (PointArray) of the evaluated cell - activate it only if needed, the cost is lot higher.

StringVectorProperty.name: PythonExpression
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the Python script that will be evaluated on each grid cell. The script has access to variables i, j and k which are the coordinates of the cell grid exprimed in the whole grid extent. The script should modify the value of variable 'ret'. If ret is 0, the cell will be discarded, otherwise it will be copied in the output grid.
